metadata.title: CVE-2022-28391 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - low
metadata.description: BusyBox through 1.35.0 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrary code ifnetstat is used to print a DNS PTR record's value to a VT compatibleterminal. Alternatively, the attacker could choose to change the terminal'scolors.

criterions.comment: busybox: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was deferred').
